121960000.text: Greetings, do you remember me? It's me, the heliobus who disguised as Wenyuan's wife.

121960001.text: The healers from the Alchemy Commission took him away... and they never came back.

121960002.text: According to the Foxian tradition, those close to the deceased should present an item from their belongings.

121960003.text: I'll offer him a kite at the Foxsomn Tomb in Fyxestroll Garden. It will be my personal way of remembering him.

121960004.text: Once this is done, I'll be waiting for you to seal me once again. See you there.
